Description: Net-sinker made of grey steatite, relatively large in size in comparison to the other net-sinkers, oval in section, the edges are rounded. The object shows three grooves, two at the ends and one a bit acentric to the middle. The surface is smoothed and shows a lot small cuts.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Amara West (Nubia), Mound β. D15.N
